title: Annual College Report
description: Digital platform for generating comprehensive annual college reports
metaDescription: A digital platform for generating and presenting comprehensive annual college reports. Features include department-wise statistics, faculty achievements, student performance analytics, and event documentation. The application uses Next.js for the frontend with Firebase providing backend services including authentication, database, and storage.

title: GitHub Repo Analyzer
description: Interactive tool for in-depth GitHub repository analysis
tech: Next.js, React, GitHub REST API, Chart.js, CSS Modules, Vercel
metaDescription: An interactive tool that provides in-depth analysis of GitHub repositories. Users can explore contributor statistics, code frequency, commit history, and repository insights using data visualization. Built with Next.js and leveraging the GitHub API to fetch and process repository data in real-time.

title: BloodConnect US
description: Platform connecting blood donors with those in need
tech: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Spring Boot, Java, MySQL
metaDescription: A comprehensive platform connecting blood donors with those in need. The application features real-time blood availability, donor registration, request management, and location-based donor matching. Built with a modern tech stack combining Next.js frontend for optimal performance and Spring Boot backend for robust API services.

title: RBU Alumni Portal
description: Alumni networking platform for university graduates
metaDescription: An alumni networking platform for Rabindra Bharati University graduates. The portal facilitates alumni connections, event announcements, job opportunities sharing, and successful graduate stories. Implemented using React with Firebase providing real-time database capabilities, authentication, and cloud storage for media.
